content.en: Smart Power Systems: Researchers have explored the applications of expert systems and artificial intelligence in power engineering. These algorithms have been used to improve the reliability of power systems by assisting in alarm processing, load forecasting, power system planning, economic dispatching, and contingency analysis. Additionally, expert systems have been developed to diagnose faults, control power systems during emergencies, and assist in power system restoration.
content.da: Smarte Powersystemer: Forskere har undersøgt anvendelsen af ekspertssystemer og kunstig intelligens inden for energiteknik. Disse algoritmer er blevet brugt til at forbedre pålideligheden af energisystemer ved at hjælpe med alarmbehandling, belastningsprognoser, energisystemplanlægning, økonomisk fordeling og beredskabsanalyse. Derudover er der udviklet ekspertssystemer til at diagnosticere fejl, kontrollere energisystemer under nødsituationer og assistere ved genopretning af energisystemer.
